author: jared.flatow
content: forgive me for asking the same question in a 7702 telegram group (and also discussing on the eth magicians forum), but I'm not sure where people are most active or might be open to discuss: it seems to me there's a relatively tiny change to the spec that would support single signature use cases. as I go through/discover past discussions, I do see there was previously quite some interest in ephemeral transactions (which I think is basically the same thing): I'd be very curious if anyone can (a) explain to me what changed their mind to believe these aren't desirable anymore OR (b) explain why the proposed modification would not actually work?
